text: Raymond Scott (born Harry Warnow; September 10, 1908 - February 8, 1994) is an American composer, band leader, pianist, record producer, and inventor of electronic instruments. == Early life and career == Scott was born in Brooklyn, New York to Russian Jewish immigrants, Joseph and Sarah Warnow. == Death == On February 8, 1994, Scott died of pneumonia in North Hills, Los Angeles, California. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1908 births Category:1994 deaths Category:20th-century American composers Category:American electronic musicians Category:American jazz composers Category:American movie score composers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Television personalities from New York City
title: Raymond Scott
